name: Sultanate of Malacca
startIntroPart2: Oh Sultanate of the great Tanah Melayu, the most precious sultanate to be live in the Tanah Melayu of the fifteen century, Golden Age of Melayu has bring successful of an largest trading port in the Southeast Asia, and once to be defeated by the Portuguese to bring the end of Malacca Era, monarchy and culture.  Sulatan of Malacca, glory and power are the keys to victory, your people are bright, and lend their iron to lead the Great Sultanate of Malacca once again!. Will your empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: So you have choosen to be extinct of the history nation,farewell.
defeated: How is it possible that you managed to destroy our kingdom?!.
introduction: Sultan of the Great Malacca, trade are acceptable for us only.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
